entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 02:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: WNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow or periods of rain mixed with drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
